message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product that I think you'll love. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm looking to sell for $18000. I believe it's worth every penny, and I'm confident you'll find it a great investment.

Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. However, considering my budget and the value I perceive for the product, I would like to propose a price of $16500. I hope this aligns better with what you're looking to receive for the item.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not quite ready to accept $16500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $17000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and quality.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand your perspective on the product's value. Considering my budget and the market rate, I would like to propose a price of $16000. I hope this is within the range you're considering.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not quite comfortable with the price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'm willing to sell the product for $16250. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value and our previous discussions.

Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. I appreciate your efforts in reaching a compromise. Based on my assessment and the negotiations so far, I would like to propose a price of $16000. I hope this proposal is acceptable and brings us closer to an agreement.

Bob, I understand that we're getting close to an agreement. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product for $16100. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and our previous discussions.

Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. Based on my assessment and the negotiations thus far, I would like to propose a price of $16000. I hope this proposal helps us reach a mutually agreeable solution.

Bob, I'm starting to get concerned that we're getting too close to the end of our negotiation. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to prioritize my own interests. I'm willing to sell the product for $16050. This is my final offer, and I hope it's acceptable to you.

Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I've considered all our previous discussions and negotiations. Based on my assessment, I would like to propose a price of $16000. I hope this final proposal allows us to conclude our negotiations satisfactorily.
